member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.CompilationFailure
member.summary: Describes a failure compiling a specific file.

member.summary: Path of the file that produced the compilation failure.

member.summary: Contents of the file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.CompilationFailure.CompiledContent
member.summary: Contents being compiled.
member.remarks: For templated files, the represents the original content and represents the transformed content. This property can be null if the exception is encountered during transformation.

member.summary: Gets a sequence of produced as a result of compilation.

member.summary: Gets the one-based line index for the start of the compilation error.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.DiagnosticMessage.StartColumn

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.ICompilationException
member.summary: Specifies the contract for an exception representing compilation failure.
member.remarks: This interface is implemented on exceptions thrown during compilation to enable consumers to read compilation-related data out of the exception

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.ICompilerOptions
member.summary: Provides an interface to well-known Compiler Options like "defines" and "optimize", as well as a general-purpose interface for reading from the 'compilerOptions' section.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.ICompilerOptionsProvider
member.summary: Specifies the contracts for a type that provides the for a project.json file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.ICompilerOptionsProvider.GetCompilerOptions(System.String,System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the parsed for a project file specified by .
member.param: Name or path of the project to read compilation settings from.
The to read framework-specific options from. When non-null, options for the specified framework are merged in to the result.
The configuration to read configuration-specific options from. When non-null, options for the specified configuration are merged in to the result.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CompilationAbstractions.ILibraryExporter
